entry.title: China Fortifies Its Borders With a 'Southern Great Wall,' Citing Covid-19
entry.content: Barbed wire, lights and cameras spring up, changing life for locals and making trade cumbersome. ‘Safeguard the sacred land.’

entry.title: Gulf Between Russia and West Laid Bare in Response to Moscow's Ukraine Demands
entry.content: Details of the contents of two bluntly-worded responses delivered to Moscow last week reveal that the U.S. and NATO flatly rejected the Kremlin’s demands about the alliance's expansion and instead laid the blame for the tension squarely on Russian President Vladimir Putin.
